item.title: Bitcoin price prediction
item.author: Frederick
item.description: 1. Introduction This is a small project to learn basics of TensorFlow and solving time series problems with RNN. For more details, please refer to the codes at Github: ysmiles. 1.1 Time-series A time series is a series of data points indexed (or listed or graphed) in time order. Most commonly, a time series is a sequence taken at successive equally spaced points in time. Thus it is a sequence of discrete-time data.
